[93mdiseases[0m, but the [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93meffects[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m. [93mHypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHOCl[0m), - [93mSynthesis[0m of [93mPhenylenediamines[0m [93mvia[0m ([93m4[0m + [93m1[0m + [93m1[0m) [93mPhotocycloaddition[0m of [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mDienes[0m and [93mIsocyanides[0m [93mEnabled[0m by a [93mGallium[0m([93mI[0m)/([93mIII[0m) [93mRedox[0m: The [93mKey[0m [93mRole[0m of a [93mPhenalenyl[0m-[93mBased[0m [93mLigand[0m.: A [93mgallacyclopentene[0m [93mcomplex[0m is [93mgenerated[0m [93mvia[0m ([93m4[0m + [93m1[0m) [93mcycloaddition[0m of a [93mGa[0m([93mI[0m) [93mcomplex[0m [93mbearing[0m a [93mphenalenyl[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mligand[0m with a [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdiene[0m. [93mUpon[0m [93mvisible[0m-[93mlight[0m [93mirradiation[0m, the [93mGa[0m([93mIII[0m) [93mcomplex[0m [93mundergoes[0m [93mhomolytic[0m [93mcleavage[0m of a [93mGa[0m-[93mC[0m [93mbond[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m the [93msubsequent[0m [93mmono[0m- and [93mdouble[0m-[93minsertion[0m [93mreactions[0m with [93misocyanides[0m. The [93mdouble[0m [93minsertion[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mundergoes[0m [93mC[0m-[93mC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mformation[0m to [93mafford[0m [93m1[0m,[93m2[0m-[93mphenylenediamine[0m, [93machieving[0m a ([93m4[0m + [93m1[0m + [93m1[0m) [93mcycloaddition[0m of [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m and [93misocyanides[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mstoichiometric[0m [93mredox[0m [93mprocess[0m and [93minsertion[0m on [93mgallium[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m a [93mproof[0m-of-[93mconcept[0m for the [93mformal[0m [93mtwo[0m-[93melectron[0m [93mredox[0m [93mprocesses[0m of [93mgroup[0m [93m13[0m [93melements[0m for [93morganic[0m [93msynthesis[0m [93menabled[0m by the [93minvolvement[0m of [93mradical[0m [93mintermediates[0m.
- [93mNovel[0m [93mSm[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mFeTiO[0m([93m3[0m)/[93mWO[0m([93m3[0m) [93mZ[0m-[93mscheme[0m [93mheterojunction[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mdegradation[0m of [93mtetracycline[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m.: As an [93miron[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mphotocatalytic[0m [93mmaterial[0m, [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m [93mhas[0m [93mbecome[0m an [93mimportant[0m [93msemiconductor[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93mexcellent[0m [93mstability[0m and [93mvisible[0m [93mlight[0m [93mabsorption[0m [93mcapabilities[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m of [93mpure[0m [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m is [93mnotably[0m [93mhindered[0m by the [93mfast[0m [93mrecombination[0m of [93mphotogenerated[0m [93mcharges[0m and its [93minsufficient[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mstrength[0m. To [93maddress[0m this, in this [93mstudy[0m, a [93mnovel[0m [93mSm[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m /[93mWO[0m [93m3[0m ([93mSF[0m/[93mW[0m) [93mcomposite[0m was [93msynthesized[0m [93musing[0m the [93msol[0m-[93mgel[0m [93mmethod[0m. The [93mdoping[0m of [93mSm[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mregulates[0m the [93mband[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m , [93msignificantly[0m [93mpromoting[0m the [93mseparation[0m of [93mcarriers[0m. At the [93msame[0m [93mtime[0m, the [93mZ[0m-[93mscheme[0m [93mheterojunction[0m [93mformed[0m with [93mWO[0m [93m3[0m [93mfurther[0m [93moptimizes[0m the [93mcharge[0m [93mtransfer[0m [91mpath[0m, not only [93mgreatly[0m [93mimproving[0m the [93mcharge[0m [93mcarrier[0m [93mseparation[0m [93mefficiency[0m but [93malso[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93mredox[0m [93mcapability[0m of the [93mphotocatalyst[0m. The [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculation[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshow[0m that the [93mstrong[0m [93minternal[0m [93melectric[0m [93mfield[0m ([93mIEF[0m) [93mformed[0m by [93mSF[0m/[93mW[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93mprovides[0m an [93mefficient[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mchannel[0m for [93mphotogenerated[0m [93melectrons[0m, [93mpromoting[0m the [93mcyclical[0m [93mtransformation[0m of [93mFe[0m [93m2[0m+ /[93mFe[0m [93m3[0m+ in the [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mprocess[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mcontinuously[0m [93mgenerating[0m [93mmore[0m [93mreactive[0m [93mspecies[0m. [93mTherefore[0m, at the [93moptimal[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mratio[0m, the [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mdegradation[0m [93mefficiency[0m of the [93mSF[0m/[93mW[0m for [93mTetracycline[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m ([93mTCH[0m) [93mreaches[0m [93m95[0m.[93m6[0m% within [93m20[0m [93mmin[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, through [93mLiquid[0m [93mChromatograph[0m [93mMass[0m [93mSpectrometer[0m ([93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m) and [93mToxicity[0m [93mEstimation[0m [92mSoftware[0m [92mTool[0m ([93mT[0m.[93mE[0m.[93mS[0m.[93mT[0m.) [93manalysis[0m [93mled[0m to the [93mproposal[0m of [93mpotential[0m [93mdegradation[0m [91mpathways[0m and an [93mevaluation[0m of the [93mtoxicity[0m of the [93mresulting[0m [93mproducts[0m.
- [93mStructural[0m [93mbasis[0m of [93mmenaquinone[0m [93mreduction[0m by [93msuccinate[0m [93mdehydrogenase[0m from [93mChloroflexus[0m [93maurantiacus[0m.: [93mSuccinate[0m: [93mmenaquinone[0m [93moxidoreductase[0m ([93mSQR[0m) [93mcouples[0m the [93moxidation[0m of [93msuccinate[0m with the [93mreduction[0m of [93mmenaquinone[0m ([93mMK[0m) as [93mpart[0m of the [93mTCA[0m [93mcycle[0m and the [93maerobic[0m [93mrespiratory[0m [93mchain[0m in [93mMK[0m-[93mcontaining[0m [93mbacteria[0m and [93marchaea[0m. [93mDespite[0m its [93msignificance[0m, [93mquestions[0m [93mpersist[0m [93mregarding[0m the [93melectron[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mmechanisms[0m that [93mdrive[0m the [93mendergonic[0m [93mMK[0m [93mreduction[0m by [93msuccinate[0m. The [93mstructures[0m of [93mtrimeric[0m [93mCaSDH[0m, [93mresolved[0m in [93mboth[0m [93mapo[0m- and [93mMK[0m-[93mbound[0m [93mforms[0m, [93mreveal[0m a [93msingle[0m [93mmembrane[0m-[93manchoring[0m [93msubunit[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mb[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mhemes[0m, a [93mcanonical[0m [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m [93msite[0m, and a [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msite[0m with [93matypical[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mconfiguration[0m and [93mspecificity[0m, [93meach[0m [93mbound[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mmolecules[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mstructural[0m [93manalysis[0m, [93mEPR[0m, and [93menzymatic[0m [93massays[0m, [93mwe[0m [93muncover[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m [91mpathways[0m [93mconnecting[0m [93msuccinate[0m [93moxidation[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mreduction[0m at the [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m and [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msites[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mstructural[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93melectron[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mMK[0m-[93mdependent[0m [93mdiheme[0m [93mSQRs[0m and [93mestablish[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mstructure[0m-[93mbased[0m [93minhibitor[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mantibacterial[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdevelopment[0m [93mtargeting[0m these [93menzymes[0m.
- [93mNitro[0m-[93mfatty[0m [93macid[0m [93msignaling[0m: [93mTherapeutic[0m [93mpotential[0m in [93minflammatory[0m [93mdiseases[0m
- [93mMitigation[0m [93mPotential[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mfabricated[0m [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m on [93marsenic[0m [93minduced[0m [93mstress[0m in [93mmorpho[0m-[93mphysiological[0m [93mgrowth[0m of [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m.: [93mArsenic[0m (As) is a [93mhighly[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93mmetalloid[0m that [93mpresents[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mhazard[0m. [93mExtensive[0m [93mcontamination[0m of [93magricultural[0m [93msoils[0m by As is a [93mglobal[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mnecessitating[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93meffective[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93mefficient[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mmitigate[0m its [93mimpact[0m on [93mfood[0m [93msafety[0m. [93mAlthough[0m [93mselenium[0m ([93mSe[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mrecognized[0m for its [93mantagonistic[0m [93minteractions[0m with As, the [93mpotential[0m of [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mSeNPs[0m) in [93mmitigating[0m As [93mtoxicity[0m [93mremains[0m [93munderexplored[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mbiocompatible[0m [93mSeNPs[0m were [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mgreen[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mVitis[0m [93mvinifera[0m [93mraisin[0m [93mextract[0m and [93mapplied[0m to [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m ([93mHUR[0m-[93m105[0m) through [93mpriming[0m, [93mco[0m-[93mapplication[0m, and [93mfoliar[0m [93mspraying[0m under As [93mstress[0m. [93mArsenic[0m [93mexposure[0m [93msignificantly[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m01[0m) [93mimpaired[0m [93mseedling[0m [93mgrowth[0m by [93mdisturbing[0m [93mnutrient[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m, [93mreducing[0m [93mchlorophyll[0m [93mbiosynthesis[0m, and [93mweakening[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m. [93mApplication[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m, [93mparticularly[0m at [93m25[0m [93mμM[0m [93mfoliar[0m [93mconcentration[0m, [93msubstantially[0m [93malleviated[0m these [93meffects[0m by [93menhancing[0m [93mantioxidant[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mactivity[0m, [93mstimulating[0m [93msecondary[0m [93mmetabolite[0m [93mproduction[0m, and [93mimproving[0m [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mefficiency[0m. [93mBiochemical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mpronounced[0m [93mincreases[0m in [93mchlorophyll[0m ([93m50[0m%), [93mcarbohydrate[0m ([93m45[0m%), [93msoluble[0m [93mprotein[0m ([93m48[0m%), and [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macid[0m ([93m44[0m%) [93mcontents[0m, [93malongside[0m a [93m38[0m% [93menhancement[0m in [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m [93mindex[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mindicate[0m that [93mSeNPs[0m [93mserves[0m as an [93meffective[0m [93mreactive[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mspecies[0m ([93mROS[0m) [93mquencher[0m, [93mmitigates[0m As-[93minduced[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mdamage[0m by [93mreinforcing[0m [93mredox[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m and [93mmetabolic[0m [93mactivity[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93munderscores[0m the [93mpotential[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m as a [93mnanotechnological[0m [93mintervention[0m to [93menhance[0m [93mstress[0m [93mresilience[0m in [93mrice[0m, while [93mhighlighting[0m the [93mnecessity[0m of [93mfield[0m-[93mscale[0m [93mevaluations[0m to [93mestablish[0m [93mdose[0m [93moptimization[0m and [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mapplicability[0m under [93mvariable[0m As [93mconditions[0m.
